api_list.name: Classify
api_list.description:
The ClassifyAI API allows you to classify text based on predefined or custom categories. With a simple HTTP request, you can provide a text input along with a list of possible classes and receive the most relevant class as the output.

To classify text using the ClassifyAI API, you need to make a POST request to the /classify endpoint with the following information:

text: The text input that you want to classify. For example, "What's the weather like today?"
classes: A list of possible classes or categories that you want to consider for the classification. For example, ["Weather", "News", "Sports"].
The API will process your request and provide a response in JSON format. The response will contain the most suitable class based on the provided text input.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://classifyai.p.rapidapi.com/classify"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "classifyai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
